quiz.question: What is the main idea behind 0/1 Knapsack?
options: Take fractional parts of items to maximize value
Select items completely or not at all to maximize value within capacity
Sort items and take the first n items
Use a greedy approach for all items
quiz.answer: Select items completely or not at all to maximize value within capacity
